trends: There have been no other sightings in Morrow
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsas i remeber it was about the middle of my fourth grade of school.my sister and i were walking to my school for a pta play i was in.as we walked toward the corner of the road that connected our neighbor hood to the school yard.a kid that i cannot remeber his name.he was looking at something in the sky,he told us it was a ufo,and as describe it looked like one.it was moving in a pattern above our neighbor hood.as we moved toward the sidewalk it seemed to be descending into the wooded area,behind the school.you could hear the trees being crushed.you could see the lights pulsating through the trees.i dont understand why but i never told anybody.i guess by chance this happened in a place where me and a couple of friends used to meet.it also seemed strange three days later while playing with a friend in the fieid infront of these woods.smoke started pouring from the woods,in the exact area where this craft had landed.my friend and i entered the woods expecting to find some other friends.to my amaze we found a large circle on the ground on fire,but only the area where this craft had bent over these sizable trees.we tried to put out the flames,but the areas we could put out.would start up again.we called the morrow fire department,to put out the blaze this should be documented for a fire behind morrow elementy.
Summary: dull silver shape disc with pulsating lights made no sound.
